DOC.brief_summary: This study to will compare the blood levels of sildenafil following administration of an experimental tablet vs. the conventional oral tablet.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Compare the Blood Levels of Sildenafil Following Administration of an Experimental Tablet vs. the Conventional Oral Tablet in Healthy Subjects.
DOC.criteria: Healthy males between the ages of 18 and 55 years. Body Mass Index of 18 to 30 kg/m2, and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs). Smoking in excess of the equivalent of 5 cigarettes per day. Treatment with an experimental drug within 30 days or sildenafil, vardenafil, tadalfil within 4 days before first study dose. Develop blood pressure lowering or experience dizziness, lightheadedness when going from the laying down position to standing position.
